content:
I don't watch shows or events, but i can tell you that many virtual shows and events have gained high viewership during the pandemic. for instance, the 2020 democratic national convention was entirely virtual and attracted a large audience. late-night talk shows and award shows have also gained significant viewership despite the lack of in-person audiences.

many theatre performances have also gone virtual, with live plays and musicals being streamed online to audiences worldwide. broadway shows, such as hamilton, have been streamed online, allowing people who wouldn't have been able to attend in-person to enjoy the performance.

despite the challenges posed by the pandemic, the entertainment industry has managed to adapt and continue to deliver content to audiences worldwide. this has demonstrated the industry's resilience and capacity for innovation in the face of adversity.
